sourcesContent:
import "./f.css" export default function F11() { return (

A sure way of making enemies and how to avoid it

  • Show respect to the other person’s opinions, never say you are wrong
  • You can tell people they are wrong by a look or gesture as eloquently as you can in words
  • And if you tell them they are wrong do you make them want to agree with you?
  • Never, because you have struck a direct blow at their intelligence, judgement, pride and self respect.
  • That will make them want to strike back, but it will never make them want to change their minds
  • There’s magic in saying “I may be wrong”, “I frequently am, lets examine the facts”
) }
